body.name: Ambi Even & Clear Purifying Charcoal Black Soap Facial Cleanser With Nutrient Rich Sweet Potato Complex | Helps Even Skin Tone | 3.5 Ounce
features: Charcoal Facial Cleanser: This face wash features oil-absorbing Charcoal to help wash away surface impurities, plus Shea Butter to provide the perfect moisture balance to the skin to combat overdrying

With Sweet Potato Complex: Known as a "beauty food," sweet potatoes are power-packed with antioxidants and Vitamins A, C and E that help fight hyperpigmentation and promote healthy, glowing and even-toned skin

The Ambi Regimen: We make dermatologist-recommended products to cleanse, moisturize and nourish, help fade dark spots and discoloration, treat acne, and even skin tone, and other solutions for melanin-rich skin

Your Skincare Journey: For smooth, even-toned, flawless looking skin try our cleansers, bar soaps, serums, moisturizers and fade creams specifically formulated for and by those with diverse skin tones
The Skin Tone Authority: For 50 years, Ambi has been rooted in catering to the skincare needs of women of color, blending science and nature to create affordable, high-quality skincare products
body.description: Oil-absorbing Charcoal helps wash away surface impurities, and Shea Butter provides the perfect moisture balance to the skin to combat overdrying. It also features our proprietary, nutrient-rich Sweet Potato Complex™. Known as a "beauty food," sweet potatoes are power-packed with antioxidants and Vitamins A, C and E that help fight hyperpigmentation and promote healthy, glowing and even-toned skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My skin loves it!
reviews.reviewText: I first used Ambi fade cream when I was 17. Somehow in my early twenties I lost track of Ambi. I rediscovered it again at age 69. That was over 50 years ago . I am happy to say that I have recently purchased almost every Ambi product in multiples because I love it that much. My skin feels clean, refreshed and I notice a visible difference in my skin. I injured my skin months ago when I rubbed it too hard in one spot on my cheekbone because it was itchy. It left a dark mark which I thought was an age spot. I tried a few other spot removers / fade creams but with no success. I started using the Ambi fade cream again and I noticed a lightening within a couple of weeks. Then I added in the cleanser and moisturizer. It's been about a week and I noticed another remarkable difference in that this spot was fading even more so. Then I tried the Ambi soap bar to use in the shower. Another delightful discovery! I love the way it made my skin feel smooth, clean and refreshed just like my face. Then I followed it with the body lotion, oh my goodness! It is so enriching for my skin which tends to remain dry. I bought four bottles because I didn't want to run out anytime soon. I will be using Ambi from this point forward. Forget the other soaps, creams, lotions, spot correctors, etc. Life is more simplified now with my effective single line of Ambi products for my skin care. Thank you for your contribution that has made a difference in my life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i've been using this cleanser every night to wash my face for almost two months now and it's worked so well for my skin. i don't really like the scent of this one, but i like that it works so i'll keep using it :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its works great, its just smells like nacho cheese 😂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't have to be expensive- to be good.
reviews.reviewText: This facial cleanser is actually pretty good, considering how affordable it is. Some things in life doesn't have to be expensive, to be good. I have combo skin and this works well. It doesn't leave my skin dry. I have been using it for a few weeks and my skin is reacting really well to this cleanser. I say that because I have sensitive skin. My skin is smoother, young and healthy looking. I have never used Ambi, but after this experience, I think I will continue. I will come back and update if anything changes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My nightly go-to
reviews.reviewText: Love this face wash. Use it as my nightly cleanser and my face feels great. No oily film and no dry patches.

reviews.reviewText: This makes my face clean and works well but the smell is a bit much. I have to mix a different soap together to stand the smell. It smells like raw potatoe to me. (I know it has sweet potatoe properties.)
